title: Pierre Guimond: betwixt Freud and Dracula
creator_credit: Nuit Blanche, Monique Turcotte and Michel Poulette
brief_description: Shows the photo montage work of Pierre Guimond who creates disturbing images using cutouts from magazines. The visual images and sounds are well matched to involve and sometimes shock the viewer. This film is suitable for upper secondary school level.
creator_credit_for_label: Nuit Blanche, Monique Turcotte and Michel Poulette
